column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This place was recommended to me from someone who grew up in Chicago.  He nailed it
column2: this pizza is unbelievable delicious.  I have celiac and was not sure
column4: thin crust pizza was amazing and I had no side effects.  The wait was ridiculous long-but worth
column6: provide your cell number and preorder your pizza.  Don't forget to check out the Malnati's salad- delicious!  None of the desserts are gluten free
column7: but you won't have room for it anyways.
